tool_description: Collection of NLP services that supports 6 languages. Named entity recognition (NER),  tokenization and sentence dependencies.
name: ADA NLP
title: ADA NLP

api_list.name: entities
api_list.description: Show entities from the specified text.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ada-nlp.p.rapidapi.com/entities"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ada-nlp.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
